name: WSTCO Holdings Limited
description: Developer of a wealth management platform designed to provide automated & recurring investment services, making wealth management accessible to all. The company's platform allows people to add their financial goals, integrate bank accounts, compare and choose from different financial products across all banks and monitor their financial growth, enabling users to make informed financial decisions.
one_liner: Developer of a wealth management platform designed to provide automated & recurring investment services, making wealth management accessible to all. The company's platform allows people to add their financial goals, integrate bank accounts, compare and choose from different financial products across all banks and monitor their financial growth, enabling users to make informed financial decisions.

name: AVIONETA Global LLC
description: Provider of healthcare services intended to help patients get rid of their alcohol addiction. The company offers a monthly subscription program that accompanies the consumer or their loved one through different services, as they progress with the program, they are able to have a healthier relationship with alcohol under measurable success criteria, providing patients with information based on science and medicine in a fresh, dignified and respectful way to control their alcohol addiction.
one_liner: Provider of healthcare services intended to help patients get rid of their alcohol addiction. The company offers a monthly subscription program that accompanies the consumer or their loved one through different services, as they progress with the program, they are able to have a healthier relationship with alcohol under measurable success criteria, providing patients with information based on science and medicine in a fresh, dignified and respectful way to control their alcohol addiction.
industry: App, Health Tech, Impact, Subscription, Wellness, Healthcare, Social Impact

name: Istidamat Albarakah Technology Holding Limited
description: Developer of online marketplace for food retailers designed to help them sell their surplus products & meals. The company provides a green discount on their surplus items using the mobile app in real-time to provide extra food to those who need it, it also provides merchants with a dashboard that illustrates business insights and impact analytics, highlighting operational efficiency and contribution towards ESG (environmental, social, and governance) objectives, enabling restaurants, bakeries, hotels, and supermarkets to reduce food waste and help the ecosystem to get better.
one_liner: Developer of online marketplace for food retailers designed to help them sell their surplus products & meals. The company provides a green discount on their surplus items using the mobile app in real-time to provide extra food to those who need it, it also provides merchants with a dashboard that illustrates business insights and impact analytics, highlighting operational efficiency and contribution towards ESG (environmental, social, and governance) objectives, enabling restaurants, bakeries, hotels, and supermarkets to reduce food waste and help the ecosystem to get better.

name: CLASSERA HOLDING INC
description: Developer of ed-tech platform and education management system intended on providing every student, teacher, or employee with the tools needed for their development regardless of their age. The company specializes in K-12 learning management systems and provides features such as a student information system, student attendance system, social learning, grade book, and transcript management system enabling users to track their records and learn at their own pace.
one_liner: Developer of ed-tech platform and education management system intended on providing every student, teacher, or employee with the tools needed for their development regardless of their age. The company specializes in K-12 learning management systems and provides features such as a student information system, student attendance system, social learning, grade book, and transcript management system enabling users to track their records and learn at their own pace.

name: CoolSo Technology Inc.
description: Developer of a gesture technology intended to focus on muscle biosensors integrating augmented reality and virtual reality. The company's technology recognizes detailed information such as muscle fatigue, gesture, and strength level, enabling clients to get wearable gesture control and rehabilitation remedies.
one_liner: Developer of a gesture technology intended to focus on muscle biosensors integrating augmented reality and virtual reality. The company's technology recognizes detailed information such as muscle fatigue, gesture, and strength level, enabling clients to get wearable gesture control and rehabilitation remedies.

name: Elevarm Technologies Pte Ltd
description: Developer of an agricultural trading platform designed to offer sustainable agriculture assistance. The company's product offers the digitization of farmlands and provides supply services that also focus on the upstream side of farming, enabling business customers and farmers to maximize production and revenue.
one_liner: Developer of an agricultural trading platform designed to offer sustainable agriculture assistance. The company's product offers the digitization of farmlands and provides supply services that also focus on the upstream side of farming, enabling business customers and farmers to maximize production and revenue.

name: Lootex Holdings Inc.
description: Developer of a cross-chain trading platform intended to liberate game asset ownership and connect blockchain games to traditional players. The company specializes in providing a game-oriented NFT marketplace and fraud-free ecosystem, enabling users to trade and discover the assets in the metaverse and also make virtual assets real by helping digital creators to protect their works.
one_liner: Developer of a cross-chain trading platform intended to liberate game asset ownership and connect blockchain games to traditional players. The company specializes in providing a game-oriented NFT marketplace and fraud-free ecosystem, enabling users to trade and discover the assets in the metaverse and also make virtual assets real by helping digital creators to protect their works.

name: Myblynk Inc
description: Operator of a property tech marketplace platform intended to protect clients' property ownership, and transform it into a digital wallet. The company's platform offers a digital home registration service, home equity investment, financing at low-interest rates and a custom dashboard for the organization, enabling borrowers with online and effortless access to mortgage options.
one_liner: Operator of a property tech marketplace platform intended to protect clients' property ownership, and transform it into a digital wallet. The company's platform offers a digital home registration service, home equity investment, financing at low-interest rates and a custom dashboard for the organization, enabling borrowers with online and effortless access to mortgage options.

name: Remoov, Inc.
description: Provider of decluttering services intended to reduce waste by increasing recycling and reuse of products. The company services collect all the items the client wants to sell, donate, or discard with one pickup, and the collected items are then handled through consignment sales, donations, or recycling, enabling users to declutter their homes.
one_liner: Provider of decluttering services intended to reduce waste by increasing recycling and reuse of products. The company services collect all the items the client wants to sell, donate, or discard with one pickup, and the collected items are then handled through consignment sales, donations, or recycling, enabling users to declutter their homes.

name: Revie LLC
description: Developer of information-providing platform designed to share reviews of e-commerce websites through WhatsApp. The company specializes in sharing user-generated text, photos and audio and automation of marketing campaigns and helps to drive sales by collecting user feedback and UGC for e-commerce platforms via WhatsApp, enabling clients to increase the number of reviews on their e-commerce and make informed decisions.

name: TEDI L.L.C
description: Operator of an online educational platform aimed at developing and improving student's education. The company's platform provides a variety of services and educational programs that prioritize developing critical-analytical knowledge to be able to apply it in real projects, are available and recorded that can be viewed around the clock, have flexible study hours, providing the students, to grow professional their path together with teachers with great experience in the world of construction and as well as course completion certificates.

name: Six Deg, Inc.
description: Developer of a social learning platform designed to promote and improve peer learning outcomes for students. The company's platform forms a social layer on top of existing enterprise learning systems to build engaging learning experiences privately and securely and helps to turn their classroom into a collaborative learning community, enabling institutions and universities to increase students' knowledge of current affairs and increase engagement and retention.
